title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 15 September 2013 - XWiki
content:
<UCC> has quit  
03:07 <abusenius> has quit  
04:30 <Denis> has joined #xwiki

16:05 <sburjan`> has quit  
17:03 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
17:16 <fm2> has joined #xwiki  
17:16 <fm2> Hi all  
17:21 <cjd> howdy  
17:22 <fm2> do you know if this page is (still) valid: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/CustomMapping  
17:22 <fm2> I am fighting to have a working custom mapping :)  
17:33 <cjd> It should work, the dynamic custom mapping has been broken for a while now but the static custom mapping should still work fine.  
17:35 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
17:37 <fm2> what about the id field? the target xclass should have it also? because xwiki complains about data exception: numeric value out of range  
17:37 <fm2> org.xwiki.velocity.XWikiVelocityException: Failed to evaluate content with id  
17:39 <cjd> hmm it might have changed in the 4.0 schema change, maybe there is a class already which is custom mapped?  
17:41 <fm2> anyway, with or without the id field defined I get the same  
18:17 <fm2> ok, nevermind  
18:17 <fm2> it works  
18:17 <fm2> it was the DB that was in a bad state  
18:19 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki
